mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (id, user_id, content, image_url, like_count, comment_count, share_count, hot_count, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{shareCount}, #{hotCount}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT p.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts WHERE status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM posts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1
SELECT p.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE posts SET hot_count = #{hotCount} WHERE id = #{id}
